imagemanager.ImageManager

Detailed Description

This class handles loading and display of images and fonts.

def imagemanager.ImageManager.drawText (   self,
  screen,
  texts,
  loc,
  fontNameNum,
  fontSize,
  align = constants.TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT,
  color = (255, 255 
)

Draw some text to the screen at the specified location.

Parameters:
texts A list of strings. Each string is drawn on a separate line.
fontNameNum Index into constants.fontNames
fontSize Integer. Must be one of the values in constants.fontSizes.
align,: Text alignment.
color,: PyGame-style color tuple, with alpha.

Member Data Documentation

imagemanager.ImageManager.animations

Maps animation names to sequences of surfaces.

imagemanager.ImageManager.animationSets

Maps animation group names to sets of animations.

Typically an animation group is all of the animations for a single creature.

imagemanager.ImageManager.fonts

Maps font names to font sizes to PyGame Font instances.

imagemanager.ImageManager.surfaces

Individual loaded surfaces.
